body_content.explanation: someone in the former Soviet Union who was not allowed to leave the country to go to live in another country, especially a Jew who was not allowed to go and live in Israel:
examples: The film consists of firsthand accounts from many former refuseniks and their foreign collaborators.
He had been a refusenik for 10 years before he received a visa to leave Russia in 1988.

body_content.explanation: someone who refuses to do, use, or accept something:
examples: The actor is a refusenik when it comes to discussing his personal life.
ID card refusniks will face fines.
